description: Work Order inputs for module wxz do not conform to the module contract.
remediation: Validate tenant inputs against modules/wxz/module.yml (ports.inputs.port) and maintenance-state/module_contract_rules.csv

description: Google Custom Search API returned a non-2xx response or an invalid payload.
remediation: Check API key/cx validity, quota, and query restrictions. Retry the Work Order after remediation.

description: Required env vars are not set for Google Custom Search.
remediation: Define GitHub secrets using the module-keyed secrets JSON structure (parent key = module_id), and map them to env in the workflow.

description: Failed to write module output files to the runtime outputs directory.
remediation: Verify runner filesystem permissions and available disk space; rerun the workflow.
